Text: Smooth install, works great! Thanks hoppy54 =)
just noticed the activation clock running on this. anyone know if it nukes itself?

@KC, Hello mate, if you unzip the programs rar there is a folder marked "windows loader".
double click the exe and it will make your copy genuine..
Thanks Hoppy. I couldn't seem to find the windows loader in the .rars I downloaded. But I did find a Remove WAT app that worked.
i get a code 5 error or something!! argh help!
i need the key to activate this
what happens when it wants to upgrade its self. will it tell me its not a proper version. thanks in advance

Hello Kernow
If you run the activator included in the rar files then you can go ahead and update mate with no problem.
Microsoft Windows 7 USB Download Tool doesn't work with this ISO? This is suspicious for untouched version of Windows.

Hoppy, I ran Windows Update and now it's saying

"Windows 7
Build 7601
This copy of Windows is not genuine"

It also started the activation clock again. I ran the RemoveWAT.exe but it says it's already removed and the only option is to Restore WAT.

Any ideas?

Hey Hoppy, thanks for the reply.

It turns out I had used Hazar's Remove WAT tool when I did the original install of this for some reason. I probably couldn't find the tools that shipped with it =p

Anyway I simply restored the WAT and then removed it again and everything is fine. It takes a couple reboots but I don't mind.

I will check out digitalrejects.co.uk as I have some other issues not related to W7 I'd like to clear up.

Thanks again!
